direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods process entity names and perform validation checks.
Both methods handle string processing with similar control flows and exception handling.
Both methods process strings but in opposite directions (escape vs. unescape).
Both methods access and manipulate entity data.

enhanced_by.reason: Initialization of escape modes is required before processing entities.
Setting up entity data is required before processing entity names.
Both methods verify entity names and handle similar exceptions.
